alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND WESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM MDT... At 130 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wakpamni, or 18 miles north of Gordon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Batesland around 135 AM MDT. Swett around 150 AM MDT. Allen around 200 AM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include southern Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
